location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 7900/46 'Memorial from Muslim League, Malakand Agency'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a telegram from the president of the Muslim League, Malakand Agency to the Secretary of State for India, requesting protection for the alleged murder and massacre of Bihar Muslims by Hindus in Chakdara. The file also contains a letter from Eion Pelly Donaldson (India Office) to the Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department discussing the disposal of the telegram and the need for no further action.

name.namePart: Indian Political Service, External Affairs Department
